articles.description: According to American author Elizabeth Holmes' book HRH: So Many Thoughts on Royal Style, Prince Charles appeared annoyed with the attention his young wife received, reported People.
articles.content:
Princess Diana's enthusiasm for fashion was used by Prince Charles to undermine her, according to claims made in a new book about the royal family's most stylish members.
The Prince of Wales, 72, ex… [+3370 chars]

articles.title: Small Axe, Steve McQueen’s new Amazon Prime film series, is revelatory - Vox.com
articles.description: The anthology of stories about London’s West Indian community premieres November 20 in the US.
articles.content:
If you are the big tree, we are the small axe.
The Jamaican proverb from which Steve McQueens new five-part Amazon anthology series, Small Axe,takes its name is a bold statement of defiance. The phr… [+8250 chars]

articles.title: Naya Rivera's ex-husband and estate file wrongful-death suit on behalf of the actress' son - CNN
articles.description: The lawsuit claims the boat Rivera was on lacked adequate safety equipment.
